医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家推出 3D 光声扫描仪，可加速血管成像以供实时临床使用研究人员开发了一种用于高分辨率血管成像的快速 3D 光声断层扫描 (PAT) 扫描仪，能够快速、详细地显示微血管系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Scientists-unveil-a-3D-photoacoustic-scanner-that-speeds-up-angio-imaging-for-real-time-clinical-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Scientists-unveil-a-3D-photoacoustic-scanner-that-speeds-up-angio-imaging-for-real-time-clinical-use.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b8883b4-5a32-45fc-aa8f-c9e157be27f5 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 23:50:00 -0400 Scientists unveil a 3D photoacoustic scanner that speeds up vascular imaging for real-time clinical use
研究显示 CheekAge 可以准确预测死亡风险我们的衰老速度并不相同。然而，虽然一些超级百岁老人可能因为赢得了基因大奖而衰老得异常缓慢，但众所周知，大量的行为和生活方式因素会加速衰老，包括压力、睡眠质量差、营养不良、吸烟和酗酒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/CheekAge-can-accurately-predict-the-risk-of-mortality-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/CheekAge-can-accurately-predict-the-risk-of-mortality-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=827bab15-b4ea-4ef4-a6e0-918c950478fb Tue, 01 Oct 2024 23:10:39 -0400 CheekAge can accurately predict the risk of mortality, study shows
长期新冠肺炎影响了 38% 症状持续的急诊患者研究人员发现，急诊室的大量 SARS-CoV-2 阳性和阴性患者均持续存在 COVID-19 后病症 (PCC) 症状，这突显了 WHO PCC 标准的非特异性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Long-COVID-affects-3825-of-emergency-病人-with-persistent-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Long-COVID-affects-3825-of-emergency-病人-with-persistent-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=908cfc2f-8b5c-41b9-adab-3fb5c877c408 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 23:09:00 -0400 Long COVID affects 38% of emergency patients with persistent symptoms
研究预示着基因测序和测试的新时代伦敦玛丽女王大学科学家领导的研究预示着基因测序和测试的新时代的到来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Research-heralds-in-a-new-era-for-genic-sequencing-and-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Research-heralds-in-a-new-era-for-genic-sequencing-and-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=254202cc-e864-4e25-92fa-561a9da10444 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 23:03:04 -0400 Research heralds in a new era for genetic sequencing and testing
新报告强调种族主义在儿童哮喘差异中的作用系统性种族主义仍然是解决儿童哮喘健康差异的一个重大挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/New-report-highlights-racisms-role-in-childhood-asthma-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/New-report-highlights-racisms-role-in-childhood-asthma-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe5cadb6-7f9a-445c-bf20-3db262e39d4e Tue, 01 Oct 2024 22:53:12 -0400 New report highlights racism's role in childhood asthma disparities
研究揭示导致肺炎克雷伯菌高毒力的遗传因素十多年前，世界各地的医生开始报告由一种新的高毒力肺炎克雷伯菌菌株引起的病例，这种菌株可能会感染其他健康的人并导致严重疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Study-reveals-genic-elements-driven-Klebsiella-pneumoniae-hypervirulence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Study-reveals-genic-elements-driven-Klebsiella-pneumoniae-hypervirulence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7103df5d-35e0-4490-9f98-7ef496a5201c Tue, 01 Oct 2024 22:47:14 -0400 Study reveals genetic elements driving Klebsiella pneumoniae hypervirulence
基因研究发现代谢综合征的关键驱动因素与脑组织的联系研究人员发现了 1,307 个与代谢综合征相关的基因位点，揭示了脑组织富集及其发育中的关键遗传因素。该研究还表明，多基因风险评分可以预测人群中的代谢综合征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Genetic-study-uncovers-key-drivers-of-metabolic-syndrome-with-brain-tissue-links.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Genetic-study-uncovers-key-drivers-of-metabolic-syndrome-with-brain-tissue-links.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=046002a8-714a-41b7-ad6b-c0538db2437e Tue, 01 Oct 2024 22:43:00 -0400 Genetic study uncovers key drivers of metabolic syndrome with brain tissue links
新研究揭示了癌症的表观遗传特征根据美国国立卫生研究院的数据，癌症死亡率有史以来首次超过心血管疾病，在美国，二分之一的男性和三分之一的女性将被诊断出患有某种形式的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Epigenic-hallmarks-of-cancer-unveiled-in-new-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Epigenic-hallmarks-of-cancer-unveiled-in-new-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7af6c780-e6b3-4579-84ef-e98a0f0cd80b Tue, 01 Oct 2024 22:36:05 -0400 Epigenetic hallmarks of cancer unveiled in new research
卢旺达正在与致命的马尔堡病毒作斗争，采取紧急应对措施在卢旺达首次爆发高传染性马尔堡病毒后，世界卫生组织（WHO）正在准备向卢旺达发送紧急物资，当局正试图追踪可能面临危险的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Emergency-response-underway-as-Rwanda-battles-deadly-Marburg-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Emergency-response-underway-as-Rwanda-battles-deadly-Marburg-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47e7fa0a-d5b2-4f7a-85d1-aa2d8dd8a901 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 22:26:53 -0400 Emergency response underway as Rwanda battles deadly Marburg virus
新见解改善了遗传性结直肠癌的基因分类疑似“遗传性结直肠癌”的基因确诊对于受影响家庭的医疗护理具有重要意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/New-insights-improve-genic-classification-for-hereditary-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/New-insights-improve-genic-classification-for-hereditary-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98514ec4-e09d-4f1d-8fdd-28bd061b7c04 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 22:22:05 -0400 New insights improve genetic classification for hereditary colorectal cancer
